title: DerpTech Project Configuration
description: Configuration file for DerpTech game projects. Contains tooling and build metadata.

projectName.description: The name of the game project. Must be alphanumeric and start with a letter.

namespacePrefix.description: The root namespace for all project code. Usually same as projectName.

description.description: A brief description of the game project.

createdDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the project was created.

templateVersion.description: Version of BaseTemplate used to create this project.
